translation.en: [narrator in English] I'm going to tell you a story.
But I'll be honest, it doesn't have a happy ending.
translation.it: Ma sarò sincero, non ha un lieto fine.

translation.en: In fact, it doesn't have an ending at all.
translation.it: Anzi, in effetti non finisce proprio.

translation.en: It's about how a bunch of institutions,
translation.it: Parla di come un gruppo di istituzioni

translation.en: some you're supposed to trust,
got together and started a war.
translation.it: hanno dato il via a una guerra.

translation.en: Not the kind of war you're thinking of...
translation.it: Non la guerra a cui stai pensando.

translation.en: the kind with tanks and planes and parades and shit.
translation.it: Non c'entrano i carri armati, gli aerei o cazzate simili.

translation.en: I'm talking about a drug war.
translation.it: Parlo di una guerra alla droga.

translation.en: The kind that's easy to forget is happening...
translation.it: Una guerra che è facile ignorare.

translation.en: until you realize in the last 30 years in Mexico
translation.it: Finché non scopri che in Messico, negli ultimi 30 anni

translation.en: it's killed half a million people...
...and counting.
Now, a lot of people don't want to hear this story.
translation.it: In tanti non vogliono sentire questa storia.

translation.en: They want to pretend it never happened.
translation.it: Preferiscono fingere che non sia mai accaduta.

translation.en: But fuck that.
It happened.
Look, I can't tell you how the drug war ends.
translation.it: Non so come finisca la guerra alla droga.

translation.en: Man, I can't even tell you if it ends.
translation.it: Non so nemmeno se finirà mai.

translation.en: But I can tell you how it began.
Or at least when we realized we were in it.
translation.it: O almeno quando ce ne siamo resi conto.

translation.en: Sometimes you need somebody to wake you the fuck up
translation.it: A volte serve che qualcuno ti tiri giù dal letto

translation.en: and tell you the shooting has started.
translation.it: e ti dica che hanno iniziato a sparare.

translation.en: In this story...
that guy's name is Kiki Camarena.
Do you smoke pot?
I guess it's okay if you do. There are laws now that say it's cool.
translation.it: Non è un problema. Ora la legge dice che si può.

translation.en: I don't agree with them. But it's not up to me.
translation.it: Io non sono d'accordo, ma non decido io.

translation.en: They say it's a gateway drug. And it is.
translation.it: Dicono sia una droga di passaggio ed è vero.

translation.en: It sure is in this story.
translation.it: Di certo lo è in questa storia.

translation.en: If you smoked pot in the late '70s, whether you know it or not,
translation.it: Se fumavi erba alla fine degli anni '70, che tu lo sapessi o meno

translation.en: that pot probably started life in the same place our story begins...
translation.it: quell'erba veniva dal posto in cui inizia la nostra storia.

translation.en: The third leg of what they call the Mexican Golden Triangle,
translation.it: Il terzo vertice del cosiddetto Triangolo d'oro messicano

translation.en: the birthplace of Mexican dope smuggling,
translation.it: terra natale del traffico d'erba del Messico

translation.en: and the guys who would go on to run the game.
translation.it: e di coloro che l'avrebbero gestito.

translation.en: With its fertile fields and hills heavy with opium poppies and Mexican marijuana,
translation.it: Con i suoi terreni fertili e le colline coperte di papaveri da oppio e marijuana

translation.en: to potheads and the Sinaloan scumbags who operated there,
translation.it: per i tossici e la feccia sinaloense che lavorava lì

translation.en: it was a regular Garden of Eden.
How's it going? [laughs]
How are things in the land of the future? [laughs]
translation.it: Come va nella terra del futuro?

translation.en: Laugh now, but the future finds us all, even here in Sinaloa.
translation.it: Ridi pure, ma il futuro arriva per tutti. Anche qui a Sinaloa.

translation.en: Look, she's my new student. This is the real future. Watch this.
translation.it: La mia ultima allieva. È questo il vero futuro, guarda.

translation.en: Okay, princess. Is this ready to harvest?
No, it's not ripe yet.
translation.it: No, è presto. Serve almeno un'altra settimana.

translation.en: -At least another week. -What do you say?
translation.it: No, è presto. Serve almeno un'altra settimana. Tu che dici?

translation.en: She's right.
He was my student. But can you believe he plays with weeds in greenhouses now?
translation.it: Era un mio allievo, da non credere. Ora gioca con le piante nelle serre.

translation.en: Like some florist. [chuckles]
[woman] Hey, you're gonna be late!
-Go on. -Go on, princess.
-You heard her. -Come on.
translation.it: L'avete sentita. - Sì, signore. - Si raccoglie tra una settimana.

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -One more week before picking.
translation.it: - Sì, signore. - Si raccoglie tra una settimana.

translation.en: So, what brings you here? Did you come out for some fresh air?
translation.it: E tu che ci fai da queste parti? Volevi prendere un po' d'aria fresca?

translation.en: My new crops need some air.
I was hoping to borrow an exhaust fan.
translation.it: Mi presteresti una ventola di scarico?

translation.en: Go, Rafa!
[man] Tell them to ring the bell!
[narrator in English] But nothing golden can stay, man.
translation.it: Ma l'età dell'oro aveva i giorni contati.

translation.en: When the government in Mexico City figured out
translation.it: Quando a Città del Messico capirono

translation.en: that a bunch of Sinaloan farmers were getting rich shipping their dope up north,
translation.it: che dei contadini di Sinaloa si arricchivano mandando droga a nord

translation.en: they decided to do something about it.
They called it Operation Condor.
It was the code name for the government's invasion of Sinaloa...
translation.it: Era il nome in codice per un'invasione governativa di Sinaloa

translation.en: a search and destroy mission designed to turn the drug trade into ashes.
translation.it: tesa a distruggere il traffico di stupefacenti.

translation.en: The army's goal was to burn every field they could find, arrest every trafficker,
translation.it: Lo scopo dei militari era quello di bruciare tutto, arrestare i trafficanti

translation.en: and remind the people living there who was boss.
translation.it: e ricordare alla gente del posto chi comandava.

translation.en: [priest in Spanish] Carefully! Carefully!
WELCOME TO BADIRAGUATO
We are the national army.
We're here to liberate you from the traffickers of Sinaloa
translation.it: Veniamo a liberarvi dai trafficanti di Sinaloa

translation.en: who have defied the federal government for too long.
translation.it: che sfidano il governo federale da troppo tempo.

translation.en: Come out with your hands in the air, or we will enter by force.
translation.it: Uscite con le mani in alto oppure entreremo con la forza.

translation.en: -[priest] Go out there, Rafa! -[Rafa] They'll kill me if I do.
translation.it: - Esci, Rafa! - Se lo faccio, mi uccidono.

translation.en: They'll kill us all if you don't.
translation.it: Se non esci, ci uccideranno tutti.

translation.en: [commander] I want you to shoot the door on my signal.
translation.it: Al mio ordine, sparate contro la porta.

translation.en: I just want them to know we're here. Okay?
translation.it: Che sappiano che siamo qui, ok?

translation.en: Good job, Comandante.
I'll get him out. The man you want is Rafa Quintero.
translation.it: Lo tiro fuori. L'uomo che cercate è Rafa Quintero.

translation.en: [commander] Hold up! Who the fuck are you?
translation.it: Ferma! E tu chi cazzo sei?

translation.en: -Who am I? -Yes. Who are you?
Miguel Ángel Félix Gallardo. Sinaloa State Police. At your service.
translation.it: Miguel Ángel Félix Gallardo, della polizia di Sinaloa. Al suo servizio.

translation.en: Do you not realize we're in the middle of an operation?
translation.it: Sai che siamo nel pieno di un'operazione?

translation.en: Come on, Comandante. It's a church.
There's children in there. There's women.
No need for such a big fuss to get one man, right?
translation.it: Non servono tante storie per prendere un uomo, no?

translation.en: Let me get him out. Everyone here knows me. Wait.
translation.it: Fatemelo portare fuori. Qui mi conoscono tutti.

translation.en: [Félix] Father, I'm coming in.
If he's not out in 30 seconds, I want everyone to start shooting.
translation.it: Se non esce entro 30 secondi aprite il fuoco.

translation.en: [Félix] There you go, fucker.
There you have him... Rafael Caro Quintero.
An illiterate moron who works for Pedro Avilés,
translation.it: Un idiota analfabeta che lavora per Pedro Avilés

translation.en: the biggest drug dealer in Sinaloa.
The government has sent the army, man.
translation.it: Il governo ha mandato i militari.

translation.en: Now you're really fucked.
translation.it: Ora sì che sei nella merda.

translation.en: Tell the gentleman here the location of the fields they haven't burned.
translation.it: Devi dire a questo signore dove sono i campi che non hanno bruciato.

translation.en: I don't know what the fuck you're talking about-- [grunts]
translation.it: Non so di che cazzo parli.

translation.en: -[Félix] Let's try that again. -[Rafa groans]
Where the fuck are the fields they haven't burned?
translation.it: Dove cazzo sono i campi che non hanno bruciato?

translation.en: -I don't know! -[grunts]
Pay attention, moron.
Where are the Tameapa fields they haven't burned?
translation.it: Dove sono i campi di Tameapa che non hanno bruciato?

translation.en: Up there, sir! Up there!
On the other side of the hill, two kilometers past the river. [coughs]
translation.it: Al di là della collina, due km oltre il fiume.

translation.en: Never met a Sinaloan cop like you.
translation.it: Mai conosciuto un poliziotto sinaloense come te.

translation.en: -What do you say? Can I take him? -Of course.
translation.it: - Cosa dice, me lo porto via? - Certo.

translation.en: We still have a lot more fields to burn.
translation.it: Abbiamo ancora molti campi da bruciare.

translation.en: Gentlemen! Let's go!
There! Hey! Stay calm.
There you go.
[Rafa] Look at what these fucking assholes have done.
translation.it: Guarda che hanno fatto questi cazzo di stronzi.

translation.en: Be quiet.
Don't get out.
Hey, it's me. I'm going to open the door.
-[boy] Dad! -How's it going, son? Are you okay?
translation.it: Papà! Come va, figliolo? Tutto bene?

translation.en: We heard them ripping the place apart.
They came back.
Just like you said they would, as if it was part of your plan.
translation.it: Proprio come avevi detto. È come se lo avessi pianificato.

translation.en: Predicting is not planning.
You all right?
Did you protect your mom?
We tried, but we were scared.
translation.it: Ci abbiamo provato, ma avevamo paura.

translation.en: Hey, you don't have to be afraid.
translation.it: Non c'è niente di cui avere paura.

translation.en: -[girl] Okay. -[Félix] All right.
Uncle!
Sweetie.
You didn't stay in the car.
The cuffs hurt, they're cutting off my circulation.
translation.it: Mi fanno male. Mi bloccano la circolazione.

translation.en: You see what they did to my greenhouse?
translation.it: Hai visto cos'hanno fatto alla mia serra?

translation.en: They didn't take all of it.
[Rafa] That should be enough.
I always said you were the brains in this house, Maria.
translation.it: L'ho sempre detto che sei tu il genio di casa, Maria.

translation.en: -[Rafa laughs] -Get inside. They're gonna see you. -Kids, go inside with him! -[grunts]
translation.it: Entra. Possono vederti. Su, entrate con lui.

translation.en: Go on, go with your uncle.
-You hit me really hard, asshole. -Don't be a crybaby.
translation.it: - Mi hai fatto male, stronzo. - Non fare la lagna.

translation.en: I considered letting them take all of it...
translation.it: Avevo pensato di lasciargliela prendere tutta

translation.en: Buy ourselves a couple of months.
translation.it: e guadagnare un altro paio di mesi.

translation.en: If we don't do it now, nothing is going to change.
translation.it: Se non lo facciamo adesso, non cambierà niente.

translation.en: I know.
But I've already told you...
if you want me to stop, I'll stop.
That's why I could never ask you to.
translation.it: Per questo non te l'ho mai chiesto.

translation.en: That was also part of your plan, you bastard.
translation.it: Penso tu abbia previsto anche questo, bastardo.

translation.en: All right.
[narrator] Military intervention never works the way you want it to.
translation.it: Gli interventi militari non vanno mai come vorresti.

translation.en: In fact, it usually backfires.
Drug dealers are like cockroaches. You can poison them, step on them...
translation.it: I trafficanti sono come scarafaggi. Puoi avvelenarli, schiacciarli...

translation.en: fuck, you can set them on fire, but they'll always come back...
translation.it: Cazzo, puoi anche bruciarli, ma tornano sempre fuori.

translation.en: usually stronger than ever.
translation.it: E di solito più forti di prima.

translation.en: Any time you think you've knocked out the dope business,
translation.it: Credi di aver sconfitto il business dell'erba

translation.en: a smart trafficker, well, he'll just find a better way.
translation.it: poi un trafficante furbo trova una strada migliore.

translation.en: [man in Spanish] Half the state is still smoldering.
translation.it: Metà del paese sta ancora bruciando.

translation.en: Mexico City's never cared about us.
translation.it: A Città del Messico non importa di noi.

translation.en: They only care about showing the Americans they can control the marijuana business.
translation.it: Vogliono solo dimostrare agli americani di saper controllare il giro di marijuana.

translation.en: Yes.
But with crisis... comes opportunity. Right?
translation.it: Ma da ogni crisi nasce un'opportunità, no?

translation.en: -You taught me that, Governor. -And risk.
translation.it: - Me l'ha insegnato lei, governatore. - E anche un rischio.

translation.en: I taught you that too.
I came to thank you for everything you've done for my family.
translation.it: Volevo ringraziarla per ciò che ha fatto per la mia famiglia.

translation.en: You had as much to do with raising Rodolfo as I did.
translation.it: Sei stato importante quanto me nell'educazione di Rodolfo.

translation.en: Could've had a real career in law enforcement, Miguel.
translation.it: Avresti potuto fare carriera in polizia, Miguel

translation.en: Head of state police, if you wanted.
translation.it: e diventare capo della Polizia di Stato, se avessi voluto.

translation.en: Might've even changed things around here.
Maybe, right? [chuckles]
But no... you never wanted to change things.
translation.it: Ma no... Non ha mai voluto cambiare niente.

translation.en: -Never aimed higher, right? -[chuckles]
translation.it: Mai voluto qualcosa di più grande.

translation.en: A Sinaloan president?
You have to make a lot of noise to change things.
translation.it: Per cambiare le cose, bisogna fare rumore.

translation.en: I'm not one for noise.
I'll tell Rodolfo you came by.
translation.it: Dirò a Rodolfo che sei passato.

translation.en: -He'll be sorry he missed you. -Yeah.
translation.it: Gli dispiacerà non averti visto. Sì.

translation.en: Whatever you're planning, be careful.
translation.it: Qualunque sia il tuo piano, stai attento.

translation.en: Yes.
All right, Governor.
[in English] It's like four o'clock in the morning, right?
translation.it: Sono le quattro del mattino, ok?

translation.en: And I'm coming up from Long Beach with a bunch of vatos.
translation.it: Arrivo da Long Beach con alcuni uomini.

translation.en: Then all of a sudden...
Fucking shit, bro. Fuck.
I get pulled over and this dude is just eyeing me, right?
translation.it: Mi fanno accostare e questo tizio mi squadra, ok?

translation.en: And I'm looking at him back and he's like, "Can I get your driver's license?"
translation.it: Lo guardo dritto negli occhi e mi fa: "Patente, prego".

translation.en: I got five pounds in the trunk and he's fucking gonna stop me for a fucking taillight?
translation.it: Ho più di due chili di roba nel bagagliaio e questo mi ferma per un fanale rotto?

translation.en: So, anyway, I look over my shoulder, and my boy Diaz, you know, he's like this.
translation.it: Ad ogni modo, guardo dietro di me e il mio amico Diaz è così.

translation.en: He's got the gun pinned against the door, right? Oof. He's not gonna go back.
translation.it: Ha la pistola puntata contro la portiera. E di sicuro non vuole tornare indietro.

translation.en: If this guy asks me to pop the trunk, I'm gonna blow his fucking head off.
translation.it: Se questo mi chiede di aprire il baule, io gli faccio saltare le cervella.

translation.en: But all of a sudden, there's... [imitates static]
Fucking radio chirps. "Robbery in progress. Blah, blah, blah."
translation.it: È la radio, cazzo. "Rapina in corso, bla bla bla."

translation.en: He comes back and he looks at me and he says, "Hey, you know what?
translation.it: Quello torna, mi guarda e fa: "Sai cosa?

translation.en: It's your lucky day. Fix that fucking taillight."
translation.it: È il tuo giorno fortunato. Aggiusta quel cazzo di fanale".

translation.en: And I'm thinking to myself, "My lucky day?"
translation.it: E io penso: "La mia giornata fortunata?"

translation.en: [Kiki] Crazy, bro.
Hey, so what's up? We gonna do this?
A fucking quarter?
Are you serious?
[man] Sample only.
Like what you see, we talk next time. I set you up with more.
translation.it: Se ti piace, te ne procuro dell'altra.

translation.en: What I want to see is a hundred.
That's not how I work, vato. Like I said, I'll start you on a sample.
translation.it: Io non lavoro così, bello. Si inizia con un campione.

translation.en: Something you could've bought off the street, right?
translation.it: Di roba che magari hai preso per strada!

translation.en: If you want to start me off with a sample, you take me to your warehouse,
translation.it: Se vuoi cominciare con un campione, mi porti al tuo magazzino

translation.en: you pull out a bale, and I take my sample from that.
translation.it: tiri fuori una balla e io prendo il mio campione.

translation.en: -What warehouse? I don't fucking know you. -Chuy's making the fucking introduction!
translation.it: Che magazzino? Non ti conosco neanche, cazzo. Chuy ci ha presentati, cazzo!

translation.en: Thought you had this lined up.
-You're wasting my time with this clown. -Listen to me, puto...
translation.it: - Mi fai perdere tempo. - Stammi a sentire, puto...

translation.en: -He's making the fucking introduction! -Hey! Chill! Chill! Chill!
translation.it: - Mi ha presentato lui! - Ehi, calmi!

translation.en: [Chuy] Yo, he didn't get that shit off the street, man. I can speak for that.
translation.it: Non ha preso quella roba per strada, garantisco io.

translation.en: [Kiki] All right.
I didn't come here for a fucking sample. All right?
translation.it: Non sono venuto qui per un campione del cazzo, ok?

translation.en: I came here for a supplier. Is that gonna be you?
translation.it: Sono venuto qui per un fornitore. Vuoi esserlo tu?

translation.en: You know what? You're kind of pushy, homes. Yeah?
translation.it: Sai una cosa? Sei un po' troppo insistente.

translation.en: So, why don't you take a hit? Chill the fuck out.
translation.it: Perché non ti fai un tiro? Magari ti rilassi.

translation.en: You know what?
I'm on parole, so I ain't hitting shit.
translation.it: Sono in libertà vigilata, non mi faccio niente.

translation.en: You and your little fucking story. What is it? Some kind of cover, puto?
translation.it: Tu e la tua storiella del cazzo. Cos'è, una cazzo di copertura?

translation.en: What, you got your cop buddies listening in right now?
translation.it: I tuoi amici sbirri ci ascoltano?

translation.en: [in Spanish] Look, motherfucker, I don't like being called a fucking liar.
translation.it: Senti, stronzo, non mi piace che mi diano del bugiardo.

translation.en: And worse...
a fucking cop.
[in English] What's he doing?
-[feedback screeches] -Jesus! Fuck.
[in English] Hey, whoever's listening, they can't hear us right now.
translation.it: Ehi, chiunque ci ascolti... ora non può più sentirci.

translation.en: -Hey... -No, no, no.
-What the fuck? -Did he just pull out a gun?
See that? Point it at my head.
Point it at me. Point it at me!
-Hey, you're fucking crazy, man. -Go like this.
translation.it: - Tu sei matto, cazzo. - Dai, così.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. There you go.
You'd know what would work better? Like that.
-Guys, relax. Give it a second. -Gotta get him out of there. Come on.
translation.it: - Kershaw. - Calmatevi. Dategli un attimo. - Dobbiamo tirarlo fuori da lì. - Non sento un cazzo!

translation.en: Can't hear a fucking thing!
translation.it: - Dobbiamo tirarlo fuori da lì. - Non sento un cazzo!

translation.en: If I was a fucking cop and I had a gun pointed to my head,
translation.it: Se fossi un cazzo di poliziotto e avessi una pistola alla testa

translation.en: they'd be rushing through that fucking door and blowing you motherfuckers away.
translation.it: sfonderebbero quella porta del cazzo e vi ammazzerebbero tutti.

translation.en: Get him the fuck out of there!
[dealer] That was crazy, fucker, eh?
-I told you. -It was funny though.
-[dealer in Spanish] Get him a beer. -[in English] I hear you, bro.
translation.it: Portagli una birra. - Sono in libertà vigilata anch'io. - Sì.

translation.en: -I'm on parole too. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Sono in libertà vigilata anch'io. - Sì.

translation.en: -It's a bitch, you know? [chuckles] -[Kiki] Fucking bitch, bro.
translation.it: - È una stronzata. - Puoi dirlo forte.

translation.en: "Pull it, pull it." You're fucking crazy.
-I like you, puto. I like you. -[chuckles]
Yeah, yo. So, listen.
So, it's like this, homie.
I got a shipment landing next week.
translation.it: Arriva un carico fra una settimana.

translation.en: -So, once it gets here... -Right.
...you come to my spot, and then you can feel all the bales you want, carnal.
translation.it: ...tu vieni da me e ti faccio provare tutte le balle che vuoi, carnal.

translation.en: -[in Spanish] All right. -[man] All right. Cheers.
[in English] I'm gonna take that quarter so my homies can get your... -samples. -[laughs]
translation.it: Mi prendo quei sette grammi, così i miei amici hanno... un campione.

translation.en: Fresno P.D.!
Fresno P.D.? What the fuck?
translation.it: Polizia di Fresno? Ma che cazzo?

translation.en: Stay down! Turn around! Get the fuck down! Against the wall! Now!
translation.it: A terra! Girati! A terra, cazzo! Contro il muro, subito!

translation.en: -Shit. -Fuck!
-Hang tight. Can we move in on this? -Fuck!
-Hey, I'm DEA, all right? -Yeah? And I'm fucking Olivia Newton-John.
translation.it: - Ehi, sono della DEA. - E io sono Olivia Newton-John.

translation.en: Shut the fuck up, chico.
Hey, you ever hear of a DEA?
Yeah, it's like... Drug Enforcement Agency or something.
translation.it: Sì, credo stia per... Drug Enforcement Agency.

translation.en: -Administration. -Yeah.
Chico over here keeps saying he's working undercover for them.
translation.it: Questo chico dice che lavora per loro sotto copertura.

translation.en: Looks like we picked up a whole team of undercovers.
translation.it: Abbiamo preso una squadra di infiltrati.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa! That's one of my guys.
Shit. Are you serious?
-Yes. -He's with you?
Yeah, that's my partner. And if it wasn't for you guys,
translation.it: Sì, è il mio partner. Se non fosse stato per voi

translation.en: we'd be taking down a hundred fucking pounds next week!
translation.it: la prossima settimana avremmo sequestrato un carico!

translation.en: Well, nothing personal, buddy.
Just tough telling the good hombres from the bad sometimes.
translation.it: È dura distinguere gli hombres buoni dai cattivi.

translation.en: No, I get it.
[narrator] Nowadays, you say you're a DEA agent, you're gonna get some respect.
translation.it: Oggigiorno, se sei un agente della DEA ti guardano con rispetto.

translation.en: But back then, people didn't know what to make of them.
translation.it: Ma allora la gente non li conosceva.

translation.en: They'd only been around for a couple of years.
translation.it: La DEA esisteva solo da un paio d'anni.

translation.en: And compared to our better-known federal agencies, the FBI and the CIA,
translation.it: In confronto ad altre agenzie federali più note tipo FBI e CIA

translation.en: they were nobodies.
In fact, in 1980, there were more women in the NYPD
translation.it: Nel 1980, c'erano più donne nella polizia di New York...

translation.en: than there were agents in the entire DEA.
translation.it: DIPARTIMENTO DI GIUSTIZIA ...che agenti della DEA.

translation.en: The headquarters in D.C. sat on top of a fucking strip club.
translation.it: Il quartier generale a Washington stava sopra a un cazzo di strip club!

translation.en: And even though they didn't need a reminder they came in last
translation.it: Sapevano di essere in fondo alle gerarchie

translation.en: in the law enforcement pecking order, they got one pretty regularly.
translation.it: delle forze dell'ordine e glielo ricordavano spesso.

translation.en: [in English] It was a rough one out there.
With all due respect, sir, it was like working with amateurs.
translation.it: Con tutto il rispetto, signore, erano dei dilettanti.

translation.en: Like six months of undercover work down the drain because of those guys.
translation.it: Sei mesi sotto copertura buttati per colpa loro.

translation.en: You don't think to inform local law enforcement
translation.it: Non hai pensato di dire alla polizia locale

translation.en: that you're running an op in their backyard?
It was only an introduction. There was no threat.
translation.it: Era solo una presentazione. Senza rischi.

translation.en: -There was no need for local P.D. -Kiki, you had a gun at your head.
translation.it: - Non serviva la polizia. - Avevi un'arma alla testa.

translation.en: Sir, it-- it's more complicated than that. You read it, sir.
translation.it: Signore, è un po' più complicato di così. Ha letto il rapporto.

translation.en: Fuck it. [sighs]
One more scumbag off the street.
translation.it: Uno stronzo in meno per strada.

translation.en: Has a decision been made about my transfer, sir?
translation.it: Hanno preso una decisione sul mio trasferimento?

translation.en: Didn't go your way.
All right.
Who did they give Miami to?
Was it Collins?
-O'Brian? -Does it matter?
No, just tell me. I can take it. Just tell me.
translation.it: Me lo dica. Posso sopportarlo. Me lo dica e basta.

translation.en: Yeah.
I didn't know he put in for it.
What am I always telling you? Attitude and experience are factors.
translation.it: Cos'è che ti ripeto sempre? Carattere ed esperienza contano.

translation.en: Kershaw has both.
I got attitude! Want more attitude? I'll give you more attitude.
translation.it: Io ho carattere! Vuole più carattere? Ok.

translation.en: Your time will come.
Five years on post here isn't enough, sir?
What other post is available, sir?
What do you have?
-[woman in English] Guadalajara? -That's all that was available.
If I stay here, my career's just gonna die.
I'm serious. No, no, I mean-- You know what?
If you don't move on, you don't move up. That's the way.
translation.it: Niente trasferimenti, niente carriera. È così.

translation.en: That from the handbook?
What do you want me to say, Kiki? -It's not Miami. -[scoffs]
translation.it: Che vuoi che ti dica, Kiki? Non è Miami.

translation.en: Miami. Fucking Kershaw. I swear. It's fucking bullshit.
translation.it: Miami. Quello stronzo di Kershaw. Che puttanata.

translation.en: Dunn's a fucking asshole.
Five years for what?
I'll stop. I'll stop.
-Kikito's about to bat. -All right.
All right, let's go, Kikito. Just like I said.
Keep your eye on the ball and swing through it, okay? Hey!
translation.it: Occhi sulla palla e batti forte, ok? Ehi!

translation.en: Keep it simple. Remember, remember, from the ground up, rotate, release,
and keep your eye on the ball. Let's go.
[Kiki] That's not how we practiced.
translation.it: Non è così che avevamo provato.

translation.en: That's your dad's genes at work right there.
translation.it: Ha il DNA di tuo padre.

translation.en: -Good contact, Kikito! -Yeah, good contact.
translation.it: - Bel contatto, Kikito! - Sì, bel contatto.

translation.en: [woman] Nice hit!
I mean, we could always move back to Calexico.
I got a better idea. Why don't you quit? Fuck it. Become a fireman again.
translation.it: Ho un'idea migliore. Perché non smetti? Cazzo, torna a fare il pompiere.

translation.en: No, I can do other things.
I can do other things.
Sure you can, honey.
-[in Spanish] Nervous? -Yes.
It's time.
Yes, it's time.
Time you buy some nice clothes, man.
translation.it: È ora che ti compri dei vestiti nuovi.

translation.en: Hello, Joaquin.
Are you coming in?
No. I'm just the farmer. Meeting him is all you.
translation.it: No. Io sono il contadino. Questo è compito tuo.

translation.en: All right.
[man] Don't you fuck with me!
Six fucking months!
We need to replant everything again.
That's the thing. We lost everything, boss.
The entire damn field.
And what were you doing while they burned my fields?
translation.it: E tu che facevi, mentre bruciavano i miei campi?

translation.en: He lost an eye, Pedro.
Yeah, I see that. Thank you for your sacrifice, Hector.
translation.it: Sì, lo vedo. Grazie di esserti sacrificato, Hector.

translation.en: But the rest of you?
I see a lot of two-eyed motherfuckers in here!
translation.it: Vedo un sacco di stronzi con due occhi!

translation.en: What the fuck did any of you do?
Go to Durango.
Tell Gomez to sell us whatever he's got.
translation.it: Di' a Gomez di venderci tutto ciò che ha.

translation.en: -It might be enough to hold us over. -Done.
translation.it: - Magari ci basta per un po'. - Vado.

translation.en: [Félix] Excuse me, boss. If you'll allow me...
I have an idea to solve this for good.
translation.it: Ho un'idea per risolvere la cosa una volta per tutte.

translation.en: Well, fuck. Didn't this guy babysit the governor's kid?
translation.it: Merda. Non faceva da babysitter al figlio del governatore?

translation.en: He could've given us a heads-up.
translation.it: Magari ha avuto una dritta da lui.

translation.en: He's the governor of Sinaloa. They don't tell him shit.
translation.it: È il governatore di Sinaloa. Non gli dicono niente.

translation.en: With all due respect, boss,
but the army burns our fields, and what do we do?
translation.it: l'esercito ci brucia i campi e noi cosa facciamo?

translation.en: We buy Durango weed and hope to stay alive, really? Again?
translation.it: Compriamo l'erba a Durango e speriamo di sopravvivere. Sul serio? Ancora?

translation.en: We'll end up the same or even more screwed when they come back.
translation.it: Quando torneranno, finiremo ancora di più nella merda.

translation.en: We have to take the business somewhere else.
Where they can't touch us. Where they wouldn't even try.
translation.it: Dove non possono toccarci. Dove nemmeno ci proverebbero.

translation.en: We have to go to Guadalajara.
We're nobodies there.
We're nobodies here, Don Neto.
translation.it: Non siamo nessuno neanche qui, Don Neto.

translation.en: The army invades us and what?
translation.it: Ci ha invaso l'esercito. E ora?

translation.en: No fucking journalist writes about it.
translation.it: Nessun cazzo di giornalista scriverà una parola.

translation.en: They do this because we are Sinaloans. We're fucked. Nothing happens here.
translation.it: Ci fregano perché siamo di Sinaloa. Non succede niente qui.

translation.en: Things are different there.
They have banks, big businesses, fancy people, and all that shit.
translation.it: Ci sono le banche. Ci sono grosse aziende e gente ricca e cazzate così.

translation.en: I'd like to see the government send the army there.
translation.it: Pensa se il governo mandasse l'esercito.

translation.en: It would be a huge mess. Front-page news and shit.
translation.it: Scoppierebbe un casino, finirebbe in prima pagina.

translation.en: I say it's the only way. But whatever you say, boss.
translation.it: Io dico che è l'unica soluzione. Ma deve decidere lei, capo.

translation.en: What does this fucker know?
He's not a trafficker.
-He's a cop. -Ex-cop.
Even worse.
Let's see... Guadalajara is still run by the Naranjo brothers.
translation.it: Vediamo... Guadalajara è in mano ai fratelli Naranjo.

translation.en: Think those fucking animals are gonna let us move into their territory, Pedro?
translation.it: Credi che quei fottuti animali ci lasceranno entrare nel loro territorio?

translation.en: You are the Lion of Sinaloa.
translation.it: Lei è il Leone di Sinaloa.

translation.en: You built all of this.
They'd be fools not to negotiate.
They're going to laugh at us.
No one fucking laughs at me.
Go to Guadalajara.
Sit down with them.
If you can't make a deal...
translation.it: Se non riesci a fare un accordo...

translation.en: it's on you.
Sounds good.
I just need someone to come with me to lend me credibility.
translation.it: Ma vorrei farmi accompagnare, per essere più credibile.

translation.en: He's right about that.
-Who do you have in mind? -Don Neto would do.
translation.it: Chi avevi in mente? Don Neto va bene.

translation.en: Well, shit. [laughs]
How many more you gonna have?
I don't know. I mean, that's only my sixth one.
translation.it: Non lo so. Questa era solo la sesta.

translation.en: I'd have my own, but I wouldn't want her to turn out like you.
translation.it: La berrei tutta, ma non voglio che lei diventi come te.

translation.en: -Yeah, nobody wants that. -[chuckles]
Why are you looking at me like that?
I think you know.
I don't.
I don't want to stay in Fresno.
You're tired of the same. I am too.
So, let's change it.
Together.
Show them what they're not seeing.
translation.it: Mostra loro ciò che non vedono.

translation.en: You sure you want that?
Don't you?
Take Mexico, Kiki. Prove them wrong.
translation.it: Accetta il Messico, Kiki. Dimostra loro che si sbagliano.

translation.en: What about you?
I have to check, but I'm pretty sure women give birth in Mexico too.
translation.it: Devo controllare, ma credo che le donne partoriscano anche là.

translation.en: Right.
[in Spanish] Passports.
Welcome to Mexico.
[in Spanish] I brought those for all of us.
Drink the ones I didn't get to.
translation.it: Prendi quelle che non ho bevuto io.

translation.en: You probably feel like hot shit kissing Pedro's ass to back you up.
translation.it: Devi crederti molto furbo a leccare il culo a Pedro per farti appoggiare.

translation.en: Let me explain how this shit works.
These guys, the Naranjo brothers, they're the competition.
translation.it: I fratelli Naranjo sono la concorrenza.

translation.en: They don't give a shit about the "Lion of Sinaloa."
translation.it: Non gliene frega un cazzo del "Leone di Sinaloa".

translation.en: And they certainly don't give a shit about you.
translation.it: E non gliene frega un cazzo di te.

translation.en: I'm treating this like a vacation to Guadalajara.
translation.it: Mi faccio una vacanza a Guadalajara.

translation.en: I'm gonna have a blast. I'm not part of your plan.
translation.it: Me la spasserò, non c'entro col tuo piano.

translation.en: I'll get you a meeting and then I'll sit back and watch you go down.
translation.it: Fisso un incontro, poi mi metto comodo e ti guardo affondare.

translation.en: Got it?
Yeah, got it.
One more thing...
that ass-kissing shit? It cuts both ways.
translation.it: Le leccate di culo sono un'arma a doppio taglio.

translation.en: You embarrass Pedro, make him look weak, he'll blow holes in you.
translation.it: Se metti in imbarazzo Pedro o lo fai sembrare debole, ti farà a fette.

translation.en: That goes for you too, cupcake.
translation.it: Lo stesso vale per te, dolcezza.

translation.en: [Félix] Go ahead.
[Don Neto] What's going on?
Once you finish, go straight to the hotel, okay?
translation.it: Quando hai finito, va' dritto in hotel.

translation.en: -Okay. -Brother...
this is serious.
Okay.
Is he looking for vocational guidance or what?
SCHOOL OF GEOLOGY
I'm getting a drink.
Perfect.
Yes, sir. You're welcome.
Do you have two rooms?
How long is your stay?
Well, indefinitely.
[man] Don Neto.
I was surprised to hear you were in town.
It was an unplanned trip.
[Don Neto] Babysitting this one.
How's your brother?
All good.
I heard about the army.
They burned your goods again, right?
translation.it: Vi hanno bruciato di nuovo la merce?

translation.en: Too bad.
But if you want to kill rats, guess you have to go into the sewer.
translation.it: Ma per uccidere i topi, devi scendere nelle fogne.

translation.en: -Right? -Yes.
Yes, of course.
Anyway, like I said, I'm here to introduce you to this guy.
translation.it: Come dicevo, sono qui per presentarvi.

translation.en: He's got a proposal for you.
-A proposal? How nice. -Yes.
Let's hear it then.
That mess that took place in Sinaloa...
translation.it: Dal casino che è successo a Sinaloa

translation.en: created an opportunity for both of our organizations.
translation.it: è nata un'opportunità, per le nostre organizzazioni.

translation.en: We're looking for a partnership.
-Partnership? -[Félix] Yes.
Well, now I'm interested.
It's very easy.
Basically, we move our growing operation here.
translation.it: In pratica, vogliamo spostare le coltivazioni qui.

translation.en: We move to Guadalajara.
And all we need from you is police protection.
translation.it: Abbiamo bisogno che ci garantiate la protezione della polizia.

translation.en: We take care of everything, the labor, the distribution, all of the costs.
translation.it: Ci facciamo carico di tutto: manodopera, distribuzione e tutti i costi.

translation.en: And we're willing to split the profits 50/50.
translation.it: E siamo disposti a dividere i profitti 50/50.

translation.en: Okay.
I mean, we're... we're the best at growing this shit.
translation.it: Insomma... siamo i migliori a far crescere questa roba.

translation.en: Well, look at this fucker.
How about we split the profits 60/40?
translation.it: Che ne dici se dividiamo i profitti 60/40?

translation.en: Here's my final offer.
You get nothing and get out of my fucking town.
translation.it: A te non tocca niente e sparisci dalla mia cazzo di città.

translation.en: Partners?
Is this guy fucking serious?
You guys have a lot of fine pussy in Sinaloa, right?
translation.it: Avete tante belle fiche a Sinaloa, no?

translation.en: Well, since everyone is going to starve, why don't you send us the best you got?
translation.it: Visto che morirete tutti di fame, perché non ci mandate le migliori?

translation.en: We'll find work for them here.
Tell the Lion that we're laughing at him in Guadalajara.
translation.it: Di' al Leone che ridiamo di lui, a Guadalajara.

translation.en: "Partnership."
You know what? I have another proposal.
-[gunshot] -[grunts]
What the fuck is wrong with you?
Are you fucking crazy?
This place is gonna be filled with cops, their cops,
translation.it: Tra poco sarà pieno di poliziotti. I loro poliziotti.

translation.en: who are gonna take us to his brother to burn us alive.
translation.it: Ci porteranno da suo fratello, che ci brucerà vivi.

translation.en: Rafa.
Come on.
You're crazy. Fuck you both.
translation.it: Siete matti. 'Fanculo a tutti e due.

translation.en: Come on. Show me. Come on, show it to me.
translation.it: Forza, fammi vedere. Dai, fammi vedere.

translation.en: I spoke to the geologist. He said that...
translation.it: Ho parlato col geologo. Ha detto che...

translation.en: Here.
-Seriously? -[Rafa] It's closer than we thought.
translation.it: - Sul serio? - È più vicino del previsto.

translation.en: We just have to dig.
Hey... stick to the plan.
[in English] Hi, I'm Kiki Camarena. I'm looking for a Jaime Kuykendall.
translation.it: Salve, sono Kiki Camarena. Cerco Jaime Kuykendall.

translation.en: Mr. Kuykendall is in the back waiting for you.
translation.it: Sì, la aspetta là in fondo.

translation.en: Thank you.
[man] Agent Camarena.
-Yes, sir. -Jaime. Jaime Kuykendall.
Nice to meet you.
-Welcome to Guadalajara. -Thank you, sir.
Come on back.
[Jaime] So, how was the trip down?
It was a little long, sir.
Having a six-year-old in the back didn't help.
translation.it: Avere un bambino di sei anni seduto dietro non aiuta.

translation.en: But I look forward to getting started.
I take it you speak Spanish?
[in Spanish] Well, the tan isn't from the sun. I was born this way.
translation.it: Beh, non sono abbronzato. Questo è il mio colore naturale.

translation.en: [in English] Well, how did that play with the boys up in Fresno?
translation.it: E come ti trovavi con i ragazzi su a Fresno?

translation.en: Like you might expect, sir.
[in Spanish] My wife is from Chiapas. But we like it better here.
translation.it: Mia moglie è di Chiapas, ma noi preferiamo stare qui.

translation.en: [in English] Yeah, I think you will too.
I mean, the truth is, this office has been needing someone like you.
translation.it: A questo ufficio serviva qualcuno come te.

translation.en: Don't get me wrong. Agents Knapp and Sears, they're strong agents,
translation.it: Non fraintendermi, gli agenti Knapp e Sears sono bravi

translation.en: but ethnicity poses its limitations on the locals here.
translation.it: ma il fattore etnico limita il loro operato con i locali.

translation.en: Sure, yeah. No, I'd imagine that the informants probably feel a little safer
translation.it: Certo. Immagino che gli informatori preferiscano parlare di corruzione

translation.en: -talking corruption to a fellow Mexican. -So, you get how Mexico works.
translation.it: - con un messicano. - Sai già come funziona.

translation.en: Uh, well, my grandmother's from Guadalajara
and I used to spend a lot of time here as a kid.
translation.it: Passavo molto tempo qui, da piccolo.

translation.en: Well, the Mex-Feds are crooked as hell, but they're what we got.
translation.it: I federali qui sono corrotti fino al midollo, ma non abbiamo altro.

translation.en: You know, we work with them best we can.
-[chuckles] We try to, anyway. -Right.
Uh, sir, is there a case that you want me to jump on?
translation.it: Signore, ha un caso da affidarmi?

translation.en: It may serve you better to think about this as more of a, uh...
translation.it: Credo ti convenga considerarla più come...

translation.en: a data-gathering assignment rather than a traditional law enforcement posting.
translation.it: ...un'operazione per raccogliere dati che un incarico tradizionale.

translation.en: You know, we can't arrest anyone.
We don't have that power.
We just gather intelligence best we can, and send it on to the agents up north.
translation.it: Raccogliamo informazioni e le mandiamo agli agenti a nord.

translation.en: Like a neighborhood watch.
We do the best we can.
No, I understand, sir. Sorry. I understand, like, you know--
translation.it: Lo capisco, signore. Chiedo scusa. Io... capisco.

translation.en: If data gathering is what you do, then, uh, I'm all in, sir.
translation.it: Se vi occupate di raccogliere dati, allora vi darò una mano.

translation.en: [knocks on desk] Good. All right. So, we hit the Camelot around 5:00.
translation.it: Bene. Andiamo al Camelot verso le 17.

translation.en: That's the bar across the street. You should join us.
translation.it: È il locale qui di fronte. Vieni anche tu.

translation.en: I mean, you've seen the desert. It's time to meet the snakes.
translation.it: Hai visto il deserto, è ora di affrontare i serpenti.

translation.en: [in Spanish] Federal Security Directorate! On your feet!
translation.it: Direzione Federale di Sicurezza! In piedi!

translation.en: I want to see your hands! Hands!
Hello.
Don't do anything stupid.
Search them.
Let's go.
We found this fat fuck leaving town.
translation.it: Questo ciccione stava lasciando la città.

translation.en: I'm dead thanks to you, asshole.
translation.it: Ci uccideranno per colpa tua, stronzo!

translation.en: Let's go. Stop talking. Let's go.
I'm a cop, too.
At least I was.
State police.
I used to patrol the fields at night back in Sinaloa.
translation.it: Pattugliavo i campi di notte, a Sinaloa.

translation.en: One night, I found a man clipping buds from the stalks back in the fields.
translation.it: Una notte, ho trovato uno che tagliava le cime di marijuana.

translation.en: Poor bastard.
Stealing from men who don't know how to forgive...
translation.it: Rubava a gente che non sa perdonare.

translation.en: just like you.
They asked me to kill him and "make him disappear."
translation.it: Mi hanno chiesto di ucciderlo e "farlo sparire".

translation.en: Do you know what I did?
I drove him out to the edge of the desert...
translation.it: L'ho portato ai margini del deserto

translation.en: I pulled him out of the car, and told him to run.
translation.it: l'ho fatto scendere e gli ho detto di correre.

translation.en: I told him to go straight until the sun rose.
translation.it: E di non fermarsi finché non sorgeva il sole.

translation.en: That man... was the brother of a cop.
translation.it: Quell'uomo... era il fratello di un poliziotto.

translation.en: He was just starting out.
They called him "El Azul."
But I think you call him something else, no?
translation.it: Ma credo che voi usiate un altro nome.

translation.en: I think you call him "Comandante."
Take me to him.
Or we'll see if you don't end up just like me.
[Knapp in English] We got two whiskeys, three Cuba libres, and cinco cervezas.
translation.it: Allora, due whisky, tre Cuba Libre e cinco cervezas.

translation.en: So, you just buy them drinks all night and hope they give you something?
translation.it: Offrite loro da bere tutta la sera sperando che vi dicano qualcosa?

translation.en: Drunker they get, the more they spill.
translation.it: Più sono sbronzi e più parlano.

translation.en: Look, nobody talks more shit than a drunk Mexican cop.
translation.it: Guarda... ...nessuno chiacchiera più di uno sbirro messicano ubriaco.

translation.en: I got it.
[in Spanish] You're new here, right?
Just got here.
Welcome to Guadalajara.
On duty?
Everyone here is on duty. Look.
-Kiki Camarena. -Sammy Álvarez.
-These guys all cops? -Yeah.
The ones in uniform are the Guadalajara municipal cops.
translation.it: Quelli in uniforme sono della Polizia Municipale di Guadalajara.

translation.en: In other words, local shit.
The ones in blue are from the Jalisco State Police.
translation.it: Questi in blu sono della Polizia Statale di Jalisco.

translation.en: The one over here is my captain.
And the judicial police?
The two tables in the back, the federales.
translation.it: I due tavoli in fondo. I federali.

translation.en: The one talking to your boss, that's Comandante Rojas.
translation.it: Quello che parla col tuo capo è il Comandante Rojas.

translation.en: And the one next to him is Comandante Mendez.
translation.it: E quello accanto a lui è il Comandante Mendez.

translation.en: You guys like to buy drinks, eh?
translation.it: Vi piace offrire da bere, eh?

translation.en: That's the American way.
-Do you want one? -Sure, I'll take the same.
[Tomás in Spanish] Comandante.
Comandante.
Good evening, everyone.
-Good evening. -Good evening.
Who are your friends?
This is the guy who saved your brother's life back in Sinaloa.
translation.it: Questo qui ha salvato la vita a suo fratello, a Sinaloa.

translation.en: Thought you'd want to talk to him before we kill him, boss.
translation.it: Ho pensato volesse parlargli prima che lo uccidessimo, capo.

translation.en: What a good idea.
Except I don't have a brother, you fucking idiot.
translation.it: Peccato che io non abbia un fratello, idiota del cazzo.

translation.en: We have a proposal.
This is their deal, I'm not with them. Just to make it clear.
translation.it: È una cosa loro. Io non c'entro. Ci tenevo a metterlo in chiaro.

translation.en: Yeah, they told me you had a proposal.
translation.it: Sì, mi hanno detto che avevi una proposta.

translation.en: I heard you had a meeting with Hernin Naranjo. And it didn't go well.
translation.it: So che l'appuntamento con Hernan Naranjo non è andato bene.

translation.en: My deal is only for you. It was never for the Naranjos.
translation.it: Il mio accordo è solo per lei, comandante. Non era per i Naranjo.

translation.en: My offer is in that bag.
translation.it: La mia offerta è in quello zaino.

translation.en: It's our new strain. It's much stronger than the shit you have here.
translation.it: È la nostra nuova varietà. È molto più forte della merda di qui.

translation.en: Jesus! Give me one of our kilos.
translation.it: Jesús! Dammi uno dei nostri chili.

translation.en: They both weigh the same. How?
Tell him, bro.
Well, I eliminated the male parts.
They were pollinating the female parts so... now there's no seeds.
translation.it: I maschi impollinerebbero le femmine. In questo modo, non ci sono semi.

translation.en: Your dope's filled with stems, seeds, shit you can't smoke.
translation.it: La vostra roba è piena di gambi, semi e merda che non si fuma.

translation.en: Ours takes up less space.
So, we can transport much more using the same number of trucks.
translation.it: Possiamo trasportarne di più, con lo stesso numero di camion.

translation.en: I'm looking for a partner.
I'm offering 50 percent. What do you think?
translation.it: Offro il 50 per cento. Che ne pensa?

translation.en: -So, what do you call this? -What do we call it?
translation.it: - E come la chiamate? - Come la chiamiamo?

translation.en: Seedless.
[Hernin] Where are the fuckers?
These are the fuckers who killed my brother.
translation.it: Sono i bastardi che hanno ucciso mio fratello?

translation.en: -Calm down. -No, fuck that!
You wanna tell me why this fucker is still breathing?
These sons of bitches die right now!
translation.it: Questi figli di puttana muoiono adesso.

translation.en: [El Azul] Put the gun down.
Down.
This fucker just killed my brother!
translation.it: Questo stronzo ha ucciso mio fratello!

translation.en: You'll have to excuse me.
But I've gotta look after my partners.
Go get them! Tomás, take care of it.
And you...
Didn't you say you aren't with them?
translation.it: Hai detto che non stai con loro?

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. He's with us.
-It was just a joke. -Yeah.
-[two gunshots from a distance] -Yeah. He just plays hard to get.
That's good.
I want my money every month.
translation.it: Voglio i miei soldi ogni mese.

translation.en: I figure it'll take a little while... for it to grow.
translation.it: Immagino ci vorrà un po'... perché cresca.

translation.en: Yeah.
All right.
First month is courtesy of the Naranjos.
translation.it: Il primo mese lo offrono i Naranjo.

translation.en: It's a pleasure.
[in Spanish] My uncle is from the Jalisco State Police.
translation.it: Mio zio è nella Polizia Statale di Jalisco.

translation.en: One day, he calls me, tells me to go to his house and bring money.
translation.it: Un giorno mi chiama e mi dice di andare a casa sua. E di portare dei soldi. Poi inizia a contarli.

translation.en: He starts to count it. Bah, bah, bah.
translation.it: E di portare dei soldi. Poi inizia a contarli.

translation.en: All of a sudden... he says that I am now a cop too.
translation.it: E di colpo mi dice... che ora sono un poliziotto anch'io.

translation.en: I guess I was helping someone get out of trouble,
translation.it: Suppongo avesse aiutato qualcuno che era nei guai

translation.en: and in exchange, he got me a job.
translation.it: e in cambio mi ha trovato lavoro.

translation.en: At least you have a job, right?
He takes ten percent of what I make.
translation.it: Si prende il dieci percento del mio stipendio.

translation.en: -What a nice guy, your uncle. -[chuckles]
-Who are they? -[Jaime in English] The boogeyman.
[in Spanish] Three whiskies.
[Sammy in English] Thank you.
[in English] Those boys are DFS.
Federal Security Directorate.
They're kind of like the KGB and the Gestapo all rolled into one.
translation.it: Una sorta di incrocio fra il KGB e la Gestapo.

translation.en: -Guess we're not buying them drinks. -No.
translation.it: - A loro non offriamo da bere. - No.

translation.en: No, they get theirs from the CIA.
Yeah. We steer clear of them, they do the same for us.
translation.it: Noi ci teniamo alla larga e loro fanno lo stesso.

translation.en: That's just kind of the deal.
Right. No, I get it.
Not our ballgame. We just provide the refreshments.
translation.it: Non è la nostra partita, noi forniamo solo le bevande.

translation.en: You learn quick.
[in Spanish] Hey, could you hand me one?
Sure.
Thank you.
You've got blood on your shoes.
[in Spanish] This is it.
It's a desert.
But there's a lot of water underneath.
Enough to grow all the dope that the U.S. smokes in a year.
translation.it: Tanta da coltivare tutta l'erba che gli americani fumano in un anno.

translation.en: You learn that in college?
That true? What he said back there? He created that shit?
translation.it: È vero quello che ha detto prima? L'ha inventata lui?

translation.en: Yes. It's his baby.
Well, then he's a genius!
That's why you brought him.
We're starting to understand each other, Don Neto.
If you guys had that magic weed, why not plant it back home?
translation.it: Se avete quell'erba magica, perché non la piantate a casa?

translation.en: It can't be done. It can't grow near any other dope.
translation.it: Non si può. Non può crescere vicino ad altra erba.

translation.en: It would get cross pollinated.
For these bitches to grow... they have to be alone.
translation.it: Per crescere... queste stronze devono stare sole.

translation.en: And Avilés?
What's he going to think about all of this?
I don't know. What do you think?
Being the biggest drug lord in Mexico?
translation.it: Essere il maggior trafficante del Messico?

translation.en: I think he'll like it.
He comes off as that type of guy. [scoffs]
translation.it: Credo che sia il tipo giusto.

translation.en: And why me?
I've got a plan.
[chuckles] I don't doubt it.
Either way, you're still fucking crazy.
translation.it: Sei sempre un matto del cazzo.

translation.en: But maybe you know more about this business than I thought.
translation.it: Ma forse ne sai di più di questi affari di quanto pensassi.

translation.en: No, I'm not interested in your business.
translation.it: No, non mi interessano i vostri affari.

translation.en: What I'm doing here... is building an empire.
translation.it: Io sono qui... per costruire un impero.
